text:
Hey friends, headed to INBOUND? We’ve got you covered with a guide specifically for developers. Excited to see and meet ya’ll in-person. Safe travels.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/the-developers-guide-to-inbound24>

We've opened up access to the dev party to ensure we catch any dev or technical folks that want to attend! We trust you to only share this with your dev, dev adjacent or dev curious network attending INBOUND :slightly_smiling_face: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/inbound24-dev-party>
